camera_please: Please grant camera permission to the app
camera_desc: After authorization, the app can access the camera, use the camera to take photos/videos
microphone_please: Please grant microphone permission to the app
microphone_desc: After authorization, the app can access the microphone, use the microphone to record
folder_please: Please grant files and media permission to the app
folder_desc: After authorization, the app can save photos, videos, and other files to local storage
notify_please: Please grant notification permission to the app
notify_desc: After authorization, the app can send notifications to the system notification bar
settings_error: Failed to open settings, please manually enable permissions
settings_desc: If authorization is not successful, please manually enable it in app permission management
overlay_please: Please grant overlay permission to the app
overlay_desc: After authorization, the app can display overlays on the screen
